RPG01<PGM>: RPG01<MODULE>
     CRTPGM PGM(&TGTLIB/RPG01) +
      MODULE(&BLDLIB/RPG01) +
      TGTRLS(&TGTRLS)

RPG01<MODULE>: RPG01.QRPGLESRC<FILE>
     CRTRPGMOD MODULE(&BLDLIB/RPG01) +
      SRCFILE(&SRCLIB/QRPGLESRC) TGTRLS(&TGTRLS) OUTPUT(*NONE)

     CRTPGM PGM(&TGTLIB/RPG02) +
      MODULE(&BLDLIB/RPG02) +
      TGTRLS(&TGTRLS)

     CRTRPGMOD MODULE(&BLDLIB/RPG02) +
      SRCFILE(&SRCLIB/QRPGLESRC) TGTRLS(&TGTRLS) OUTPUT(*PRINT)

     CRTPGM PGM(&TGTLIB/PROVA) +
      MODULE(&BLDLIB/PROVA) +
      TGTRLS(&TGTRLS)

     CRTCLMOD MODULE(&BLDLIB/PROVA) +
     SRCFILE(&SRCLIB/QCLSRC) TGTRLS(&TGTRLS) OUTPUT(*NONE)
